channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Angel
channel.description:
Class Type: Neutral Support
Day Ability 1: (2 uses)
Love Kiss: Kiss the selected player today (Makes them night immune for tonight, but only get notified if they get attacked)
Day Ability 2: (1 use)
TRAITOR!!!: Switches to winning with the Neutral Killer
Night Ability 1: (3 uses)
Guidance: Makes selected player occupied immune
Night Ability 2 (1 use can only use after N3)
Sword of the Angels: Attack any player (Does not apply if your faction is the Evils, can attack King)
Extra: Doesn't know who's Evil or who's good like the King
Goal: Is to survive with your random selected Faction (Randomly selects Unseen/Cult or BD. Can win with the Neutral Killer if use Traitor ability. If the Neutral Killer dies, they will live but does not win.)
Lore: The Angel has looked down upon this kingdom. Man is fighting with each other. It is time to guide them to peace with each other. But the Angel sees the Evils mindsets. The Angel wonders if that mindset was the good one. But shall see who they shall help in the overworld.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Angel
item.dc:creator: _PG_Felgurity
item.description:
Class Type: Neutral Support

Day Ability 1: (2 uses)

Love Kiss: Kiss the selected player today (Makes them night immune for tonight, but only get notified if they get attacked)

Day Ability 2: (1 use)

TRAITOR!!!: Switches to winning with the Neutral Killer

Night Ability 1: (3 uses)

Guidance: Makes selected player occupied immune

Night Ability 2 (1 use can only use after N3)

Sword of the Angels: Attack any player (Does not apply if your faction is the Evils, can attack King)

Extra: Doesn’t know who’s Evil or who’s good like the King

Goal: Is to survive with your random selected Faction (Randomly selects Unseen/Cult or BD. Can win with the Neutral Killer if use Traitor ability. If the Neutral Killer dies, they will live but does not win.)

Lore:
The Angel has looked down upon this kingdom. Man is fighting with each other. It is time to guide them to peace with each other. But the Angel sees the Evils mindsets. The Angel wonders if that mindset was the good one. But shall see who they shall help in the overworld.
